TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SettingsManageability extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides values to indicate which services should be made available to application settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ttribute is used to apply individual application settings properties and property groups to indicate that special, predefined services are to be provided for them. The SettingsManageability enumeration lists the services that are available. Most of these services will be provided by the Windows operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.SettingsManageability Roaming = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Enables application settings to be stored in roaming user profiles. For more information about roaming user profiles, see [Isolated Storage and Roaming](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d3cca593-4521-408d-b323-ea398d226de3).
